name: camljs
description: Library for creating SharePoint CAML queries client-side. For JSOM, REST or SPServices.

scripts.build: tsc && browserify lib/camljs.js -x xmldom -s CamlBuilder -o dist/camljs.js && tsc --declaration lib/camljs.ts --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist/
scripts.test-common: npm run build && tsc tests/Tests.ts --target es6 --module commonjs
scripts.test-html: npm run test-common && browserify tests/Tests.js -x xmldom -s Tests -o tests/Tests.bundle.js
scripts.clean: del tests\Tests.js && del tests\Tests.bundle.js && del dist\*.* /Q

author: Andrei Markeev
